name: ImageSaverTest
description: Unit tests for the ImageSaver class, focusing on its run method and utility class assertion.

test_cases.name: testSaveImageToNonExistentDirectoryThrowsRuntimeException
test_cases.description: Tests that saving an image to a non-existent directory throws a RuntimeException.

test_cases.name: testRunThatThrows
test_cases.description: Tests that the run method of ImageSaver throws a RuntimeException when the Callable throws an IOException.

test_cases.name: testRunThatDoesNotThrow
test_cases.description: Tests that the run method of ImageSaver does not throw an exception when the Callable does not throw an exception.

test_cases.name: testIsUtilClass
test_cases.description: Tests that the ImageSaver class is correctly identified as a utility class.
